column5: While on my way home from work this morning, I did see a glimmer of hope as I crossed over the Holland River bridge in Bradford. I think you all know what I'm talkin' 'bout!
Did you see an old guy with an Ice/snow walker by chance?
the pigeon river in omemee had ice on it this morning on my way to work !!!!   it was -9
Drove by Little Lake in Midland yesterday and it was froze over but with the temps this weekend it won't last.
